If you encounter any BOM problem like:

{{{
wowmodelviewer/src/app.cpp:1: error: stray '\357' in program
wowmodelviewer/src/app.cpp:1: error: stray '\273' in program
wowmodelviewer/src/app.cpp:1: error: stray '\277' in program
}}}

Try do strip UTF8 BOM from all files.

{{{
<?php
function removeBOM($str = '')
{
   if (substr($str, 0,3) == pack("CCC",0xef,0xbb,0xbf)) {
       $str = substr($str, 3);
   }
   return $str;
}
$dir = "./";

// Open a known directory, and proceed to read its contents
if (is_dir($dir)) {
    if ($dh = opendir($dir)) {
        while (($file = readdir($dh)) !== false) {
            if ($file == "." || $file == "..")
                continue;
            if (filetype($dir.$file) == "file") {
                $c = file_get_contents($dir.$file);
                file_put_contents($dir.$file, removeBOM($c));
            }
            echo "filename: $file : filetype: " . filetype($dir . $file) . "\n";
        }
        closedir($dh);
    }
}
?>
}}}
